Token.Abstract: The RKTestFactory class provides an interface for initializing RestKit objects within a unit testing environment. The factory is used to ensure isolation between test cases by ensuring that RestKit's important singleton objects are torn down between tests and that each test is working within a clean Core Data environment. Callback hooks are provided so that application specific set up and tear down logic can be integrated as well.
Returns the base URL with which to initialize AFHTTPClient and RKObjectManager instances created via the factory.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The base URL for the factory.

Token.Abstract: Sets the base URL for the factory.
Returns the base URL as a string value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The base URL for the factory, as a string.

Token.Abstract: Sets the base URL for the factory to a new value by constructing an RKURL from the given string.

Parameter.Name: baseURLString
Parameter.Abstract: A string containing the URL to set as the base URL for the factory.

Token.Abstract: Returns the filename used when constructing instances of RKManagedObjectStore via the factory.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string containing the filename to use when creating a managed object store.

Token.Abstract: Sets the filename to use when the factory constructs an instance of RKManagedObjectStore.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectStoreFilename
Parameter.Abstract: A string containing the filename to use when creating managed object store instances.

Token.Abstract: Defines a factory with a given name for building object instances using the given block. When the factory singleton receives an objectFromFactory: message, the block designated for the given factory name is invoked and the resulting object reference is returned.

Parameter.Name: factoryName
Parameter.Abstract: The name to assign the factory.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to execute when building an object instance for the factory name.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a new instance of an object using the factory with the given name.

Parameter.Name: factoryName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the factory to use when building the requested object. @raises NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if a factory with the given name is not defined.

Parameter.Name: properties
Parameter.Abstract: An NSDictionary of properties to be set on the created object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An object built using the factory registered for the given name.

Token.Abstract: Fetches a shared object from the factory with the given name. If an existing object has already been created, then that instance is returned. If a shared instance does not yet exist, one will be constructed and returned for this and all subsequent invocations of sharedObjectFromFactory:. Shared object instances are discarded when the factory is torn down.

Parameter.Name: factoryName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the factory to retrieve the shared instance of.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The shared object instance for the factory registered with the given name.

Token.Abstract: Inserts a new managed object for the NSEntityDescription with the given name into the specified managed object context and sets properties on the instance from the given dictionary. A permanent managed object ID is obtained for the object so that it can be referenced across threads without any further work.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity to insert a new managed object for.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectContext
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to insert the new object into. If nil, then the managed object context returned by invoking [RKTestFactory managedObjectStore].mainQueueManagedObjectContext] is used.

Parameter.Name: properties
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of properties to be set on the new managed object instance.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new object inheriting from NSManagedObject.

Token.Abstract: Returns a set of names for all defined factories.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A set of the string names for all defined factories.

Token.Abstract: Fetches the shared AFHTTPClient object using the factory defined for the name RKTestFactoryDefaultNamesClient.
Fetches the shared RKObjectManager object using the factory defined for the name RKTestFactoryDefaultNamesObjectManager.
Fetches the shared an RKManagedObjectStore object using the factory defined for the name RKTestFactoryDefaultNamesManagedObjectStore.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The shared managed object store instance.

Token.Abstract: Sets up the RestKit testing environment. Invokes the didSetUp callback for application specific setup.
Tears down the RestKit testing environment by clearing singleton instances, helping to ensure test case isolation. Invokes the didTearDown callback for application specific cleanup.
